data.lyric:
[ti:Hangin' On]
[ar:Chris Young]
[al:Losing Sleep]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Hangin' On - Chris Young
[00:09.05]Written by：Corey Crowder/Chris Young/Josh Hoge
[00:18.11]I'm a few drinks in but that ain't the reason
[00:21.34]I'm all tongue tied and my breath's leaving this fast
[00:25.76]
[00:26.64]I can't get past those blue eyes shining
[00:32.14]They keep drawing me in to you
[00:35.26]Got me falling off track
[00:37.97]
[00:39.08]You get me like that
[00:41.32]
[00:42.35]Yeah I'm hangin' on hangin' on
[00:45.39]To every word you say
[00:47.17]Every move you make
[00:49.10]I'm hangin' on hangin' on
[00:51.50]Wondering what's up next
[00:53.39]Girl I can't wait
[00:55.07]Ain't nothing like spinning you around the room
[00:58.08]Where everyone can see
[01:00.34]
[01:01.13]You hangin' on hangin' on to me
[01:05.11]
[01:10.67]It ain't the song and it ain't the playlist
[01:13.81]It's every smile coming off of your sweet lips yeah
[01:17.63]
[01:18.76]That makes me wanna stay here
[01:20.96]
[01:22.74]No this ain't a one night one time thing
[01:25.73]You always light me up like a flame and it's clear
[01:30.07]
[01:31.08]Every time you're near
[01:33.76]
[01:34.58]Yeah I'm hangin' on hangin' on
[01:37.67]To every word you say
[01:39.56]Every move you make
[01:41.29]I'm hangin' on hangin' on
[01:43.78]Wondering what's up next
[01:45.57]Girl I can't wait
[01:47.31]Ain't nothing like spinning you around the room
[01:50.50]Where everyone can see
[01:52.62]
[01:53.40]You hangin' on hangin' on to me
[01:57.44]
[02:01.19]Yeah you hangin' on to me
[02:03.33]
[02:09.95]So let me pull you a little closer
[02:12.57]
[02:16.20]Even when the music's over
[02:19.59]
[02:20.86]I'll be hangin' on hangin' on
[02:23.82]To every word you say
[02:25.75]Every move you make
[02:27.52]I'm hangin' on hangin' on
[02:30.04]Wondering what's up next
[02:31.73]Girl I can't wait
[02:33.42]Ain't nothing like spinning you around the room
[02:36.35]Where everyone can see
[02:38.74]
[02:39.59]You hangin' on hangin' on to me
[02:43.57]
[02:47.32]Yeah you hangin' on to me
data.trans:
[ti:Hangin' On]
[ar:Chris Young]
[al:Losing Sleep]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:09.05]//
[00:18.11]我喝了几杯酒但这不是理由
[00:21.34]我张口结舌气喘吁吁
[00:25.76]
[00:26.64]我无法忘记那双闪耀的蓝眼睛
[00:32.14]它们不断吸引我靠近你
[00:35.26]让我误入歧途
[00:37.97]
[00:39.08]你让我怦然心动
[00:41.32]
[00:42.35]我咬牙坚持
[00:45.39]你说的每一句话
[00:47.17]你的一举一动
[00:49.10]我会坚持到底坚持到底
[00:51.50]不知道接下来会发生什么
[00:53.39]女孩我迫不及待
[00:55.07]没有什么比得上让你在房间里转来转去
[00:58.08]每个人都能看见
[01:00.34]
[01:01.13]你对我念念不忘
[01:05.11]
[01:10.67]这不是歌也不是播放列表
[01:13.81]每一个微笑都发自你的唇
[01:17.63]
[01:18.76]让我想留在这里
[01:20.96]
[01:22.74]这不是一夜风流的事情
[01:25.73]你总是像火焰一样点燃我的心显而易见
[01:30.07]
[01:31.08]每当你靠近我
[01:33.76]
[01:34.58]我咬牙坚持
[01:37.67]你说的每一句话
[01:39.56]你的一举一动
[01:41.29]我会坚持到底坚持到底
[01:43.78]不知道接下来会发生什么
[01:45.57]女孩我迫不及待
[01:47.31]没有什么比得上让你在房间里转来转去
[01:50.50]每个人都能看见
[01:52.62]
[01:53.40]你对我念念不忘
[01:57.44]
[02:01.19]你紧抓着我不放
[02:03.33]
[02:09.95]所以让我把你拉近一点
[02:12.57]
[02:16.20]即使音乐结束
[02:19.59]
[02:20.86]我会坚持不懈坚持不懈
[02:23.82]你说的每一句话
[02:25.75]你的一举一动
[02:27.52]我会坚持到底坚持到底
[02:30.04]不知道接下来会发生什么
[02:31.73]女孩我迫不及待
[02:33.42]没有什么比得上让你在房间里转来转去
[02:36.35]每个人都能看见
[02:38.74]
[02:39.59]你对我念念不忘
[02:43.57]
[02:47.32]你紧抓着我不放
